item.title: HTML5 Video tag, and webm
item.description: In ancient times, when youtube was born, we didnâ€™t have VIDEO tag. We used to have Flash. To play video on the website, we had to convert it to weird Flash video format, leave mp4 for safety and hope that everything will work fine. Later on, when HTML5 became a industry standard, our live become some much easier. In the theory VIDEO tag solves all out issues. When browser can handle webm (Chrome family) we play webm.
